messages.label: error

exceptions.message: SQLSTATE[42S02]: Base table or view not found: 1146 Table 'mypersimmon.pit_id' doesn't exist (SQL: select `pit_tags`.*, `pit_id`.`posts_id` as `pivot_posts_id`, `pit_id`.`tags_id` as `pivot_tags_id` from `pit_tags` inner join `pit_id` on `pit_tags`.`id` = `pit_id`.`tags_id` where `pit_id`.`posts_id` is null)
SQLSTATE[42S02]: Base table or view not found: 1146 Table 'mypersimmon.pit_id' doesn't exist

statements.sql: select `id` as `postid`, `title`, `category_id`, `markdown` as `description`, `user_id` as `userid`, `flag` as `wp_slug`, `created_at` as `dateCreated` from `pit_posts` where `id` = '1' and `pit_posts`.`deleted_at` is null limit 1
